DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of coadministered Irbesartan and Atorvastatin in patients with hypertension and hyperlipidemia.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Irbesartan and Atorvastatin in Hypertension and Hyperlipidemia
DOC.criteria: Aged between 19 and 75 years Signed informed consent At screening, SPB ≥ 180mmHg or DBP ≥ 110mmHg or LDLC > 250mg/dL or TG ≥ 400mg/dL Has a history of hypersensitivity to Angiotensin Ⅱ receptor blocker or HMGCoA reductase inhibitor or component of this drug Has a history of multidrug allergy
